channel.title: Minimum Segment Size on Philipp Gärtner Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Minimum Segment Size on Philipp Gärtner Blog

item.title: Break Detection on Borussia Dortmund (BVB) stock prices - Part II The optimal h-parameter of BFAST
item.description: In this blog post I use stock prices of the Borussia Dortmund (BVB) sports club to detect and characterize abrupt changes within the trend component of the time series. The main objective is, to search and find the optimal segmentation parameter which characterizes the timing and magnitude of abrupt changes best.
